entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 this evening except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this evening and after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait early in the evening. Wind becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
